tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NNP Perfect)) (PP (IN for) (S (VP (VBG expressing) (S (NP (NNS limits)) (NP (PRP you))) (PP (TO to) (NP (CD 140) (NNS chars)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Perfect/NNP acl>[expressing/VBG mark>for/IN xcomp>[you/PRP nsubj>limits/NNS] nmod:to>[chars/NNS case>to/TO nummod>140/CD]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (JJ other) (NN hand))) (, ,) (VP (VB think) (ADVP (RB twice)) (PP (IN before) (S (VP (VBG sending))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [think/VB nmod:on>[hand/NN case>on/IN det>the/DT amod>other/JJ] punct>,/, advmod>twice/RB advcl>[sending/VBG mark>before/IN] punct>./.]
